entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 12:48 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
